jsx-tag.begin:
(?x)
  (?<=[({\[,?=>]|&&|\|\||\?|\Wreturn|^return|\Wdefault|^)\s*
  (?!(<)\s*([_$a-zA-Z][-$\w.]*(?<!\.|-))\s*(>)) #look ahead is not start of tag without attributes
  (?!<\s*[_$[:alpha:]][_$[:alnum:]]*((\s+extends\s+[^=>])|,)) # look ahead is not type parameter of arrow
  (?=(<)\s*
  ([_$a-zA-Z][-$\w.]*(?<!\.|-))
  (?=\s+(?!\?)|/?>))
